snippet: After his wife recanted an allegation of abuse, Patricio Jimenez sued the city for false arrest. A judge dismissed the lawsuit, and has now ordered the man and his lawyer to pay $19,075 in sanctions.
abstract: Judge Shira A Scheindlin orders Patricio Jimenez and his lawyer Gregory P Mouton Jr to reimburse New York City $19,075 for its work in defending itself from frivolous lawsuit brought by Jimenez; Jimenez sued city for false arrest on domestic violence charges, claim city calls baseless.
lead_paragraph: After his wife recanted an allegation of abuse, Patricio Jimenez sued the city for false arrest. A judge dismissed the lawsuit, and has now ordered the man and his lawyer to pay $19,075 in sanctions.

headline.main: Plaintiff and Lawyer Ordered to Reimburse New York in False-Arrest Suit
headline.print_headline: 2 Men to Pay City Over Suit That Claimed False Arrest
